activities:
CATS Software, Inc. develops and provides applicant tracking system software based on SaaS (Software as a Service). 

The software product is used by clients for their (internal) recruiting purposes. The data which is stored by our clients contains information about: candidates and candidate applications, candidates resumes and cover letters, company information, contacts, job orders, various type of communications, notes etc.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data. Organization, client and consumer. Consumer data includes phone numbers, email addresses and resume(s)/CV's. include manually processed data
recoursemech: All disputes that cannot be resolved between CATS Software, Inc. and the complainant shall be resolved using the American Arbitration Association (AAA) (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
